Azureblade was badly battered, but still, his internal computer 
started emitting a signal for someone to pick him up.

Yggdrasil, was amazed. Lunekill was dead, and now Unicron was coming 
for them.

Yggdrasil: Kup, Azure's down near your position. Would you pick him 
up?

Blackfang woke up from his slumber in CR and looked around in the 
base, unaware of anything that had just happened.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime/Kup/Lunekill/Darkangel/DeathStar : :
>  
> Rodimus Prime looked up just in time to see Kup and the other 
Maximal's shots strike Lunekill at her core.
>  
> Lunekill's face showed nothing but pain and horror and her core 
exploded blowing her apart from within. Her last words were haunting, 
however.
>  
> Lunekill: We are merely the first wave, soon you'll face.... 
UNICRON!
>  
> The battle was over and, although damaged, the Maximals and their 
base had survived.
>  
> Rodimus, Kup and Darkangel, who had come out of stasis, all made 
their way to where Lunekill had just died.
>  
> Kup: Lads, I feel we have a problem...
>  
> Darkangel: Now, Rodimus Prime, will you commit the Maximals to 
Tyrael's alliance? Now that you know exactly what you will be dealing 
with.
>  
> Rodimus Prime: Why didn't you just tell me the truth, Tripred. You 
said a great force was coming but you never told me it was Unicron!
>  
> Darkangel: My orders were not to inform you of that as of yet. Now 
you know and it makes no difference. Will you join the Tripredacus 
and Predacons in this venture? Will you help supply parts for our 
anti-Unicron weapon?
>  
> Rodimus looks down, thinking it over. What other choice was there? 
This was the only way to protect his Maximals....
>  
> He looks over at Nightlight and thinks about Elita.
>  
> ... And his family.
>  
> Rodimus Prime: Yes. I here by ally the Maximals with the 
Tripredacus and Predacons for this, and only this, project.
>  
> Darkangel: Great! Star preparing parts. I'll go inform Tyrael and 
then return to help. Beast mode!
>  
> Darkangel transforms to his bat form and flies off. Flight was 
difficult since his wings had been wounded in the battle.
>  
> 
**********************************************************************
***************
>  
> : : DeathStar : : 
>  
> At the selected location for the "uber gun," DeathStar had finished 
setting up the hovor platform and other parts that he had brought. 
Now he needed a team of workers from the factions and the weapon 
parts to start construction on the gun.
>  
> Tyrael would need to be informed of the progress. With the 
communication jammers still in place he would have to go himself.
>  
> To guard the huge platform DeathStar activates a force field around 
it.
>  
> DeathStar: Flight mode!
>  
> The TM2 Tripredacus agent transformes to his flight mode and heads 
for the Tripred base.
>  
>  
> 
>
